sentence: The  US  defence  secretary  reiterated  Israel's  right  to  defend  itself,  but  suggested  the  killing  of  civilians  would  "drive  them  into  the  arms  of  the  enemy"  An  adviser  to  Israel's  prime  minister  told  the  BBC  that  Israel  is  making  "maximum  effort"  to  avoid  killing  civilians.
